price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߸ ߞߏ߫ ߣߌ߫ ߥߘߊ ߞߵߊ߬ ߘߊߥߎ߲߫ ߒ߬ߠߎ߬ ߞߙߎߓߊ ߢߣߊ߫߸ ߊ߲ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߓߣߐ߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِنۡ أَكَلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُ وَنَحۡنُ عُصۡبَةٌ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in akalahu al-dhi'bu wanaḥnu ʿuṣ'batun innā idhan lakhāsirūna
